name: academic-equipment-order-system
description: Academic Equipment Order System - Full Stack

scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend,ai -c blue,green,magenta "npm run backend" "npm run frontend" "npm run ai-service"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend,ai -c blue,green,magenta "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend" "npm run ai-service"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../ai-service && python3 -m venv venv && . venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
